casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Mosley, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Mosley (1996), 75 Ohio St.3d 429.]

(No. 95-2589 Submitted February 20, 1996 Decided April 17, 1996.) Michael Miller, Franklin County Prosecuting Attorney, and Joyce S. Anderson, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Mark H. Mosley, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the decision of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in its memorandum decision.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Wright, J., not participating.
